attributes.action: wake up and smell the coffee..Ok you have failed to kill the numbers but you are a spent force...Keep working on overseas affairs and in the small time left to you you migh make you, you may well make your mark.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stand down now. The electorate want change. As a life long left winger, I feel the BNP offers the truth and way forward, merely by the fact you pretend to be left wing, when in reality you are slightly to the left of hilter.I will reqest 3 months as you cant survive beyond this

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
